system.Text:
When **you travel across hazardous or unfamiliar lands**, set the rank of your journey.

  * Troublesome journey: 3 progress per waypoint.
  * Dangerous journey: 2 progress per waypoint.
  * Formidable journey: 1 progress per waypoint.
  * Extreme journey: 2 ticks per waypoint.
  * Epic journey: 1 tick per waypoint.

Then, for each segment of your journey, roll +wits. If you are setting off from a community with which you share a bond, add +1 to your initial roll.

On a **strong hit**, you reach a waypoint. If the waypoint is unknown to you, envision it (@Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure). Then, choose one.

  * You make good use of your resources: Mark progress.
  * You move at speed: Mark progress and take +1 momentum, but suffer -1 supply.

On a **weak hit**, you reach a waypoint and mark progress, but suffer -1 supply.

On a **miss**, you are waylaid by a perilous event. @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.c10d64f58dd8c5bf]{Pay the Price}.

Trigger.Text: When you travel across hazardous or unfamiliar lands...

Strong Hit.Text:
You reach a waypoint. If the waypoint is unknown to you, envision it (@Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure). Then, choose one.

  * You make good use of your resources: Mark progress.
  * You move at speed: Mark progress and take +1 momentum, but suffer -1 supply.

Weak Hit.Text: You reach a waypoint and mark progress, but suffer -1 supply.

Miss.Text: You are waylaid by a perilous event. @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.c10d64f58dd8c5bf]{Pay the Price}.
